mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_agent_report (application_id, application_name, agent_id, ip_address, progress_id, agent_version, simulator_version, cur_upgrade_batch, status, agent_error_info, simulator_error_info, env_code, tenant_id) VALUE (#{applicationId}, #{applicationName}, #{agentId}, #{ipAddress}, #{progressId}, #{agentVersion}, #{simulatorVersion}, #{curUpgradeBatch}, #{status}, #{agentErrorInfo}, #{simulatorErrorInfo},#{envCode},#{tenantId}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE cur_upgrade_batch = #{curUpgradeBatch}, status = #{status}, agent_error_info = #{agentErrorInfo}, simulator_error_info = #{simulatorErrorInfo}, gmt_update = now()
mapper.select: select id from t_agent_report WHERE gmt_update <= #{date}
